content: **new pattern 24 11 24** inspiration to create this pattern was a landscape of the spring orchard nearby my home the finishing of the edge of the shawl reminds me of small droplets that form from spring mists settle and flow down the branches of trees this shawl will be perfect for long spring and autumn walks it s very light and airy but at the same time it protects from cold and wind selected combination of stitches makes it very versatile it can be an addition to many styles and outfits thanks to it s minimalistic yet romantic vibe shawl dimensions 178 cm/ 70 lenght x 56 cm/22 width after blocking
